Judul: DESIGNING AND LEADING LEARNING ECOSYSTEMS: CHALLENGES AND OPPORTUNITIES
Abstrak:
The 2017 AECT International Convention invited technology
advocates to demonstrate what their most influential, high
potential tools for learning. I was amazed to visit many excellent
presentations by researchers, graduate students, policy
makers, teachers and corporate learning experts in this ‘tech
fair’ event showcasing, to my surprise, a majority of augmented
and virtual reality technologies. A buzz from participants
reported loving this moment in a ‘tech fair’ setting. I was also
somewhat surprised that the event pressed our host hotel’s
(regulated) internet bandwidth beyond its capacity. We live
in a connected world. To use a smart city metaphor, it was
